overview: Lizzie Firkin's house is a mess.  The cat sleeps in the breadbin and cobwebs cling to the curtains. Lizzie has no time to tidy up - she is far too busy working at a famous nightclub,  tap-dancing and playing the trombone.  So one day Lizzie sends for Robin Puckertucker, the Wonder Housekeeper, and the result is quite a surprise to them both.
title: Keeping House
